channel.title: Adding clip to Npc's
channel.description:
Hey first of all, thanks for reading this and trying to help me out, I really appreciate it. Second of all, I noticed that the the npcs on my server are able to ignore the walls and other boundaries, similar to the ::noclip command.
Anyway... I'm using a deltascape based server (that doesn't mean I'm a leecher...) and I'd like to know how to add this small but crucial point in the server.
Thanks, Mod Whip Legendz Owner of Legendz PK[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 09:47:56 pm[/size][hr]thanks for any help, I'll be going for the night.

item.title: Adding clip to Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Hey first of all, thanks for reading this and trying to help me out, I really appreciate it.
Second of all, I noticed that the the npcs on my server are able to ignore the walls and other boundaries, similar to the ::noclip command.

Anyway… I’m using a deltascape based server (that doesn’t mean I’m a leecher…) and I’d like to know how to add this small but crucial point in the server.

Thanks,
Mod Whip
Legendz
Owner of Legendz PK[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 09:47:56 pm[/size][hr]thanks for any help, I’ll be going for the night.
